divs: Sighting DetailsThe First time i saw a UFO was in Japan, at night. there was a bright light that kept zooming in and out and moving crazy (Up, Down, side to side etc..). the second time i was on vacation in Egypt and i was sitting beside the pool (also at night) with my parents, and i was looking up in the sky and i found three big white dots in the sky flying in straight line, the dots were like this. O O O. then suddenly the two dots at the ends started roaming around the one in the middle then they suddenly went up down like i explained above. then it disappeared . i tried convincing my parents and friend but the thought i was crazy.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Sinai
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Three Large dots rotating around the middle one then disappears in
